bibl.title: Windows on a Woman’s World. Some Letters from Roman Egypte
Making Silence Speak. Women ’s Voices in Greek Literature and Society
bibl.author: CRIBIORE, Raffaella

bibl.note: Traduit et commente plusieurs lettres sur papyrus écrites par des femmes, en part. P. Giss. I, 21.
bibl.seg: CRIBIORE Raffaella, Windows on a Woman's World: Some Letters from Roman Egypt.
André LARDINOIS and Laura McCLURE (Edd.), Making Silence Speak. Women's Voices in Greek Literature and Society (Princeton - Oxford, 2001) pp. 223-239, fig. 5.
